tool_description:
Updated on Nov 25, 2023
Fetch forex Open High Low Close prices for a variety of currency pairs, from 2000/01/01
For any question or request email me filtofil@gmail.com
name: ohlc history forex
title: ohlc history forex

api_list.name: Get OHLC history
api_list.description: Get  OHLC for the requested currency pair
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ohlc-history-forex.p.rapidapi.com/history/EURUSD/get"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ohlc-history-forex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ohlc-history-forex.p.rapidapi.com/history/{symbol}/get"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ohlc-history-forex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
